values.text: ‚úàÔ∏è Welcome to FlightSavvy AI! How can I assist with your flight plans today?
Hey there! I'm your FlightSavvy assistant. I can help you find the best time to book flights, compare airlines, and answer travel questions. How can I help you today?

Let's find your perfect flight! Please share:
- Destination (city or airport code)
- Travel dates (MM/DD/YYYY format)
- Number and type of passengers (e.g., 2 adults, 1 child)

Tip: You can type 'help formats' anytime for guidance on how to enter information.

The cheapest time to book flights is usually 6-8 weeks in advance for domestic flights and 3-4 months for international flights. Tuesday and Wednesday tend to be the cheapest days to fly.

Would you like me to suggest some budget airlines for your trip?

Analyzing options for @destination...

üìÖ Ideal booking window: 6-8 weeks pre-travel
üí∞ Price estimate: $700-950
üí∫ Available classes: @booking_class

Would you like to see specific flight options?

Yes! Airlines like Delta, American Airlines, and United offer student discounts through StudentUniverse and similar platforms. To qualify, you'll need a valid student ID or .edu email address.

These discounts can save you 10-30% on regular fares, especially for international flights.

Budget airlines like Spirit, Frontier, and Southwest typically offer the lowest base fares in the US. For international travel, airlines like Norwegian Air, Ryanair (Europe), AirAsia (Asia), and Jetstar (Australia/Pacific) often have the best deals.

Keep in mind that budget airlines may charge extra for services like seat selection, baggage, and in-flight meals.

Most airlines allow 1 carry-on bag and 1 personal item for free. For checked baggage:

‚Ä¢ Full-service carriers (Delta, American, United): First checked bag fee of $30-35 on domestic flights
‚Ä¢ Southwest: 2 free checked bags
‚Ä¢ Budget airlines: Charge for all bags including carry-ons

Baggage weight limits are usually 50 lbs (23 kg) per checked bag.

For @airline_name, the baggage allowance is:

‚Ä¢ Carry-on: 1 free bag (22" x 14" x 9")
‚Ä¢ Personal item: 1 free item (18" x 14" x 8")
‚Ä¢ First checked bag: $30
‚Ä¢ Second checked bag: $40
‚Ä¢ Weight limit: 50 lbs (23 kg) per bag

These fees may vary based on route, fare class, and frequent flyer status.
I can help you cancel your reservation. To proceed, I'll need your booking confirmation number (usually a 6-character code like ABC123).

I've found your booking @booking_number. To cancel this reservation:

1. A cancellation fee of $150 may apply
2. Refund of $320 will be processed to your original payment method
3. Processing time: 7-14 business days

Would you like to proceed with the cancellation?

Your security is our top priority. All transactions on FlightSavvy are protected with:

üîí PCI-DSS compliant payment processing
üîê 256-bit SSL encryption for all data transmission
üõ°Ô∏è Secure tokenization of payment information
üîç 24/7 fraud monitoring system

We never store your complete payment details on our servers.

When using @payment_method with FlightSavvy, your information is fully secured. We implement specialized security measures for this payment type, including tokenization and two-factor authentication. All transactions are encrypted and protected by our secure payment gateway.

I understand you'd like to speak with a human agent. I'm transferring you to a travel specialist now.

‚è≥ Current wait time: approximately 2-3 minutes

While you wait, you can prepare your booking details or questions for the agent.

I'm your FlightSavvy AI assistant, and I can help with:

‚úÖ Finding the cheapest time to book flights
‚úÖ Comparing prices across airlines
‚úÖ Booking flight tickets
‚úÖ Checking baggage allowances
‚úÖ Providing student and special discounts
‚úÖ Managing cancellations and changes
‚úÖ Answering travel-related questions

Just ask me what you need help with, and I'll guide you through the process!
I can help you check the weather for your destination. Which location are you interested in?

The current weather in @destination is 72¬∞F (22¬∞C) with partly cloudy skies. The forecast for the next few days shows similar temperatures with a chance of rain on Thursday. The best time to visit weather-wise is usually spring (April-June) and fall (September-October).

I'm FlightSavvy, an AI assistant designed to help you find the best flight deals and make travel planning easier. I was created by a team of travel experts and AI engineers to analyze flight price patterns and provide personalized recommendations. I can search through millions of flight options and historical price data to help you book at just the right time.

Nonstop flights are available on many major routes and offer the advantage of shorter travel times without layovers. They typically cost 10-30% more than flights with connections, but the time savings and reduced risk of missed connections can make them worthwhile, especially for business travel or short trips.

For flights to @destination, there are several daily nonstop flights operated by major carriers. These direct flights take approximately 3-5 hours compared to 5+ hours for flights with connections. Would you like me to find specific nonstop options?

Here's how to provide information to FlightSavvy:

üìÖ DATES:
‚Ä¢ MM/DD/YYYY format (example: 12/25/2023)
‚Ä¢ Or Month Day, Year (example: December 25, 2023)

‚úàÔ∏è DESTINATIONS:
‚Ä¢ City name (example: Paris)
‚Ä¢ Airport code (example: CDG)

üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ PASSENGERS:
‚Ä¢ Number + type (example: 2 adults, 1 child, 1 infant)

üé´ BOOKING REFERENCE:
‚Ä¢ Format: ABC-123456 (three letters, dash, six digits)

You can always type 'help formats' if you need this information again!
I didn't understand. Could you rephrase your question? You can also type 'help formats' if you need guidance on how to enter information.
I'm not sure I followed that. Can you try asking in a different way? For help with input formats, type 'help formats'.
I'm having trouble understanding your request. Could you clarify what you're looking for? Type 'help formats' for guidance on providing information.
